SDK setup

The KNX IoT Point API solution from Nordic Semiconductor is based on the nRF Connect SDK v2.3.0.

Use the Nordic’s nRF52840 DK to create a KNX IoT Point API prototype for Light Switch Actuator and Light Switch Sensor samples.

  1. Set up your development environment by following one of the installation methods below:

    Follow the steps in Installing automatically to perform automatic installation using the Toolchain Manager.

    Follow the steps in Installing manually to perform a manual installation.

    Note

    For additional information on setting up the device as well as Nordic’s development environment and tools, see the nRF Connect SDK Getting started guide.

  2. Clone the KNX IoT Point API private repository.

    $ git clone https://github.com/konradderda/nordic_knx.git

  3. Download dependencies.

    $ git submodule init
$ git submodule update

  4. Download the nRF Command Line from the nRF Command Line Tools page.

  5. Optionally, to configure Wireshark for Thread packets sniffing, go to the Configuring Wireshark for Thread page.
